CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 11, 1941, pg. 16 reads: "Start From Every Branch Of Sports World Participate In "Y" Programs" Portion of article by Robert Hughey reads: "'Y' Physical Department Sets Sports Pattern For Pittsburgh  As a record-breaking membership campaign draws rapidly to a close, we invite your attention to one particular phase of the Centre Avenue Y.M.C.A. program, one which, above all others, has served as the cog-wheel in splendid progress of a great institution, the physical department."  It is not difficult to realize the fact that now, as in previous years, the sport element of the program serves as the motivating force behind the growing success at the 'Y.'  Down through the years, athletic activities and personalities have helped make the Centre Avenue YMCA what it is today..Greater Pittsburgh's hub of recreation and athletic competition."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Henry Armstrong wearing suit, speaking into microphone in ring in Centre Avenue YMCA
